title: [Large-Scale] VR/AR Integration Strategy Development Project for Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Design and implementation of science learning scenarios via smartphone-based VR/AR tools

learning_goals: Learners can explain the science education content design process utilizing VR/AR technologies
Learners can develop science learning modules applicable with smartphone-based AR/VR tools in constrained technological environments
Learners can analyze barriers to VR/AR implementation in science education using semi-structured interview techniques

resources: VR/AR Sample Content for Science Education
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
